solutions.heading: Save Energy at Home!
solutions.description: Saving energy reduces air and water pollution and conserves natural resources, Contribute by switching to LED bulbs, Hang-Dry Clothing, and Turning unused appliances and equipment off!

solutions.heading: Consider Public Transportation
solutions.description: Taking public transportation can create a healthier environment, saving natural resources and reducing harmful chemicals!

solutions.heading: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
solutions.description: Recycling reduces the risk of air pollution from manufacturing processes as well as by keeping waste out of landfills!
